quotes.text: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.
quotes.author: Charles Péguy

quotes.text: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.text: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.text: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.text: Gravitation cannot be held responsible for people falling in love. How on earth can you explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love? Put your hand on a stove for a minute and it seems like an hour. Sit with that special girl for an hour and it seems like a minute. That's relativity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: So then, the relationship of self to other is the complete realization that loving yourself is impossible without loving everything defined as other than yourself.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.text: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back, they're yours; if they don't, they never were.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Friendship often ends in love, but love in friendship - never.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: Genuine love should first be directed at oneself; if we do not love ourselves, how can we love others?
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.text: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Love doesn't make the world go round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Browning

quotes.text: Do all things with love.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.text: Age does not protect you from love. But love, to some extent, protects you from age.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Love is a serious mental disease.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Friendship always benefits; love sometimes injures.
quotes.author: Seneca the Younger

quotes.text: Love demands infinitely less than friendship.
quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

quotes.text: Love and friendship exclude each other.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.text: Speak low, if you speak love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: Friendship is Love without his wings!
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.text: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.text: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.text: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.text: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: We can only learn to love by loving.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.text: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.text: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

quotes.text: Where there is great love, there are always miracles.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.text: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.text: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: I love my past. I love my present. I'm not ashamed of what I've had, and I'm not sad because I have it no longer.
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.text: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.text: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.text: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.text: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.text: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.text: Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
quotes.author: David McCullough

quotes.text: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.text: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: Among the things you can give and still keep are your word, a smile, and a grateful heart.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: A thing constructed can only be loved after it is constructed; but a thing created is loved before it exists.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: Absence makes the heart grow fonder.
quotes.author: Thomas Haynes Bayly

quotes.text: Only do what your heart tells you.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.text: When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it's bottomless.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.text: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.text: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not of.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The heart has eyes which the brain knows nothing of.
quotes.author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quotes.text: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
quotes.author: Henry van Dyke Jr.

quotes.text: A man sees in the world what he carries in his heart.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: We know the truth, not only by the reason, but by the heart.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Go to your bosom: Knock there and ask your heart what it doth know.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: The place to improve the world is first in one's own heart and head and hands.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.text: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.text: The amount of happiness that you have depends on the amount of freedom you have in your heart.
quotes.author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quotes.text: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.text: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.text: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Everyone has been made for some particular work, and the desire for that work has been put in every heart.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams, who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.text: Sad thing is, you can still love someone and be wrong for them.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.text: The difference between impossible and possible is a willing heart.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.text: Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: A warrior does not give up what he loves, he finds the love in what he does.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.text: Love yourself with the same intensity you would use to pull yourself up if you were hanging off a cliff.
quotes.author: Kamal Ravikant

quotes.text: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius
